items.title: TikTok reportedly developing new version of app ahead of planned US sale
items.description: TikTok is developing a new version of its app for U.S. users ahead of an expected sale of the app to a group of investors, according to a new report f...

items.title: Ingram Micro says ongoing outage caused by ransomware attack
items.description: Ingram Micro is one of the largest distributors of tech and cloud products.

items.title: Apple appeals EU’s €500M fine over App Store payment restraints
items.description: Apple has filed appealed the EU's decision to fine the company €500 million (about $580 million) for not complying with competition rules.

items.title: ‘Improved’ Grok criticizes Democrats and Hollywood’s ‘Jewish executives’
items.description: On Friday morning, Elon Musk declared, “We have improved @Grok significantly. You should notice a difference when you ask Grok questions.”

items.title: At least 36 new tech unicorns were minted in 2025 so far
